creator: Next Tech Games Studios - Paint by Numbers Books
descriptionHtml:
Explore your imagination through the beautiful anime characters and enjoy your spare time. If you are looking for fun and enjoyment, then start anime glitter coloring book and make the best manga drawings by showing your painting skills. It provides the most relaxing and simplest way to release your stresses, increase your creativity in painting!

Let's start to color your worries and paint anime princesses with sparkling glitter shades like a real artist. Every fan of anime will love painting these anime girls with glitters. Color anime heroes, manga heroes, and Japanese princess cartoons to reduce your mental stress and show some creativity in glitter coloring.

How To Play:
- First of all, choose the anime character you want to paint.
- Glitter drop in the same numbers blocks very easily.
- Just follow the numbers in pictures and make manga princess glitter drawings with anime music.
- Get hints to see which areas are unfilled.
- Save your artwork in the gallery and share your creations.

Features:
- Enjoy sandbox number coloring experience.
- Build your own collections with colorful treasures.
- Gives innovative filling in a way that you feel all your stress released away.
- Unlimited glitter colors to choose that fits your mood.
- A perfectly relaxing way to become the master of your mind.
- Easily color anime with stress relief therapy.
- Try new ideas, inspirations, and recolor the completed artworks whenever you want.

Rediscover the simple relaxation and joy of coloring with royal manga pages. It's a free and interesting anime coloring book for kids and adults with amazing anime characters to discover paint art based on numbers.

If you are a coloring enthusiast, then get this chance to show your color of the world through your own artworks. We provide this best antistress glitter coloring artwork to reduce mental stress.
descriptionShort: Let's get rid of mental stress and be an artist with virtual kawaii manga girls.

title: Anime Manga Paint by Number - Glitter + Color Book

container.value: Building # 596 G1, Johar Town Lahore Pakistan

creator: Margala Games
descriptionHtml:
Explore the secret garden created in beautifully detailed illustration drawings and bring them to life using these colorful palettes with your imagination. This free coloring puzzle contains many pictures of anime heroes, cute manga girls & boys, beautiful Japanese cartoons design and images. Every fan of naruto will love painting this awesome adult anime color by number book. So, enjoy the best adult coloring anime manga pages with an increased level of concentration.

Enjoy the sandbox coloring book with your creative ideas and feel like an artist with a complete variety of anti-stress pictures. Calm down and enjoy hours of fun and relaxation. Choose from a wide range of pictures and color by number the ones you like to create your artworks.

How To Play:
- First of all, choose the anime picture and color mode you want to color in images.
- Watch a video tutorial to color manga pictures in glitters, watercolors, crayons, oil paint, and solids.
- Just follow the numbers in anime pictures and paint manga drawings.
- Fill the boxes by the same number colors or make your color combinations.
- Zoom in-out option available for paint by number small details of anime manga coloring book.
- Choose the hint option to complete the number coloring book.
- Get two extra hints by watching ads or purchase hints according to need.
- Watch video ads to unlock the locked anime pages or remove ads and unlock pictures by purchasing in-app.

Features:
- Colorable anime pictures to reduce stress levels.
- Bright and beautiful crayons and glitters to use for drawing and filling.
- Brings rest to your restless mind and body.
- The anime coloring book includes cute girls coloring pages, anime face coloring pages, anime love story coloring pages and other cool anime manga coloring drawings for color by number.
- Reduce mental stress by coloring anti-stress glitter artworks.
- Pixel coloring styles for adults, teens, and anime manga coloring fans.
- Sandbox number coloring has many interesting pixel pages and number books for you to coloring.
- Get inspired by our amazing coloring community and share your creativity with us.

It is perfect for adults who love to paint and color by number. Maybe you saw hundreds of anime coloring pages, but this ultimate coloring book inspired by famous Japanese manga books and it will certainly evoke your artistic talent and provide you with hours of anime color by number.

If you are a coloring enthusiast, then get this chance to show your color art. You will find so many free and fascinating anime cartoon pictures in adult anime crayons and glitter coloring book.

Let's make anime coloring be your favorite hobby and addicted to adorable manga scenes.


In Premium Subscription:
- You can subscribe weekly for $6.99 and get unlimited access to all content.
- Unlock everything with New Images updated every day and Remove all Ads.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off or canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
- Payment will be charged to google pay at confirmation of purchase.
- An account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen subscription.
